name: parcel-scss
description: 1. Navigate to your Wordpress local development environment and into your 'themes' directory

scripts.start: parcel assets/scss/main.scss assets/js/main.js --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && npm parcel cache clean
scripts.build: parcel build assets/scss/main.scss assets/js/main.js --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && npm parcel cache clean
